short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open XRAY Partials in VS Code quickly with the context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Peeky adds a "Show partial in VS Code" option to webpage context menus. This extension requires the Peeky VS Code extension to be installed, and for the site to use the xray-rails gem.
